description.value:
The graveknight unleashes a @Template[cone|distance:30] of energy. Creatures in the area take @Damage[((match(when(lte(@actor.level, 3), 1),when(btwn(@actor.level, 4, 11), 2),when(btwn(@actor.level, 12, 18), 3),when(gte(@actor.level, 19), 4)))d(match(when(lte(@actor.level, 0), 6),when(eq(@actor.level, 1), 8),when(btwn(@actor.level, 5, 6), 12),when(eq(@actor.level, 7), 10),when(gte(@actor.level, 8), 12))) + (match(when(eq(@actor.level, -1), 1),when(eq(@actor.level, 0), 3),when(btwn(@actor.level, 1, 2), 4),when(eq(@actor.level, 3), 8),when(btwn(@actor.level, 4, 5), 7),when(eq(@actor.level, 6), 10),when(eq(@actor.level, 7), 12),when(eq(@actor.level, 8), 15),when(eq(@actor.level, 9), 17),when(eq(@actor.level, 10), 20),when(eq(@actor.level, 11), 22),when(eq(@actor.level, 12), 19),when(eq(@actor.level, 13), 21),when(eq(@actor.level, 14), 24),when(eq(@actor.level, 15), 26),when(eq(@actor.level, 16), 29),when(eq(@actor.level, 17), 31),when(eq(@actor.level, 18), 34),when(eq(@actor.level, 19), 29),when(eq(@actor.level, 20), 32),when(eq(@actor.level, 21), 34),when(eq(@actor.level, 22), 37),when(eq(@actor.level, 23), 39),when(eq(@actor.level, 24), 42))))[@actor.flags.pf2e.ruinousWeaponType]] for a creature of the graveknight's level with a @Check[reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value + 2)|basic|options:area-effect] based on a high DC of the graveknight's level.

The graveknight can use this ability once every [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Devastating Blast]] rounds.

This energy damage is of the same type as that of their ruinous weapons, and Devastating Blast gains the associated trait.
